CutSceneText.Text: I am Belus Asylvade. I am the headmaster of the Tijerid Military Academy, and also an advisor of Lord Mikael Rheal.
I've already heard about you from the intelligence staff officer. You have accomplished much.
It's shame, but Lord Mikael is under treatment now so he is unable to see you...
But he has insisted me to give you a reward.
I've already spoke to Tellia, the knight standing in front of the door, so make sure you receive it.
And... Regrettably, I do not know where Jurid has disappeared to.
If you ever come across rumors of his whereabouts or him, please let me know.
...And, I guess you must be aware as well, but as the reputation of Tijerid is at stake... Please don't speak of this matter to anyone else.
Of course, I'll keep that in mind.
